trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 物件，該物件封裝指定目錄之指定型別的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates the access control rules for the file described by the <paramref name="path" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 物件，該物件封裝 <paramref name="path" /> 參數所描述之檔案的存取控制規則。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for a directory.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取目錄的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 環境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>授與使用者時如果使用者具有<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>父資料夾的權限。

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>，拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>父目錄上。

trans-unit.target: 取得目錄的建立日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A structure that is set to the creation date and time for the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 結構，設定為指定之目錄的建立日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: 這個值以本地時間表示。

trans-unit.source: This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.File.GetCreationTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the directory described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: 如果目錄中所述`path`參數不存在，這個方法會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)，調整為本地時間。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: The path of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.target: 取得目錄的建立日期和時間，格式為國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: A structure that is set to the creation date and time for the specified directory.

trans-unit.source: This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。

trans-unit.source: If the directory described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，取得基礎上 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 的目錄的建立時間。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.

trans-unit.source: for reading the specified file or directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current working directory of the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式的目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path of the current working directory, and does not end with a backslash (\\).
trans-unit.target: 含有目前工作目錄路徑且未以反斜線 (\\) 結尾的字串。

trans-unit.source: The current directory is distinct from the original directory, which is the one from which the process was started.
trans-unit.target: 目前的目錄是不同於原始的目錄，這是從中啟動處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the `GetCurrentDirectory` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 `GetCurrentDirectory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows CE, which does not have current directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統是 Windows CE，它沒有當前的目錄功能。

trans-unit.source: This method is available in the .NET Compact Framework, but is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: .NET Compact Framework 提供方法，但目前不支援。

trans-unit.source: for access to path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 針對目前的目錄的存取權的路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of subdirectories that meet specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合指定準則之子目錄的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之目錄的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串不會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of subdirectories (including their paths) in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之目錄中的子目錄名稱 (包括其路徑)。

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) of subdirectories in the specified path, or an empty array if no directories are found.
trans-unit.target: 指定之路徑中的子目錄完整名稱 (包括路徑) 陣列，如果找不到任何目錄則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern, so it returns all subdirectories.If you need to search subdirectories, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.SearchOption%29> method, which enables you to specify a search of subdirectories with the `searchOption` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>以星號 (\*) 指定搜尋模式，所以它會傳回所有子目錄。如果您要搜尋的子目錄，請使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.SearchOption%29>方法，可讓您指定具有子目錄搜尋`searchOption`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The names returned by this method are prefixed with the directory information provided in `path`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所傳回的名稱前面會加上提供的目錄資訊`path`。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example takes an array of file or directory names on the command line, determines what kind of name it is, and processes it appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會在命令列上的檔案或目錄名稱陣列，決定何種名稱，並適當地加以處理。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查詢無效字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a file name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: for accessing path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 用來存取目前的目錄路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之目錄的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串不會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of subdirectories in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要比對 <c>path</c> 中子目錄名稱的搜尋字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以包含有效常值與萬用字元的組合，但是不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of subdirectories (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定目錄中符合指定搜尋模式的子目錄名稱 (包括檔案的路徑)。

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) of the subdirectories that match the search pattern in the specified directory, or an empty array if no directories are found.
trans-unit.target: 指定目錄中，符合搜尋模式的子目錄完整名稱 (包括路徑) 陣列，如果找不到任何目錄則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method returns all subdirectories directly under the specified directory that match the specified search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回指定目錄直接下所有符合指定的搜尋模式的子目錄。

trans-unit.source: If the specified directory has no subdirectories, or no subdirectories match the `searchPattern` parameter, this method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的目錄中有任何子目錄，或任何子目錄符合`searchPattern`參數，這個方法會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: Only the top directory is searched.
trans-unit.target: 只有最上層目錄中搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If you want to search the subdirectories as well, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.SearchOption%29> method and specify <xref:System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories> in the `searchOption` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要搜尋的子目錄以及，使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.SearchOption%29>方法並指定<xref:System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories>中`searchOption`參數。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元規範

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"\*t 」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也不能包含任何無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查詢無效字元。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information, and is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊，且不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of subdirectories in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要比對 <c>path</c> 中子目錄名稱的搜尋字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以包含有效常值與萬用字元的組合，但是不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include all subdirectories or only the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值會指定搜尋作業應該包含所有子目錄或只包含目前目錄。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of the subdirectories (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the specified directory, and optionally searches subdirectories.

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) of the subdirectories that match the specified criteria, or an empty array if no directories are found.
trans-unit.target: 符合指定之準則的子目錄完整名稱 (包括路徑) 陣列，如果找不到任何目錄則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information, and is not case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元規範

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".

trans-unit.source: The specified path is not found or is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑未找到或無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: for access to path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 針對目前的目錄的存取權的路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之目錄的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串不會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of files in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要比對 <c>path</c> 中檔案名稱的搜尋字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以包含有效常值路徑與萬用 (* 和 ?) 字元的組合，但是不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of files (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定目錄中符合指定搜尋模式的檔案名稱 (包括檔案的路徑)。

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) for the files in the specified directory that match the specified search pattern, or an empty array if no files are found.
trans-unit.target: 指定目錄中，符合指定搜尋模式的檔案完整名稱 (包括路徑) 陣列，如果找不到任何檔案則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The returned file names are appended to the supplied `path` parameter and the order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> method if a specific sort order is required.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的檔案名稱會附加至提供`path`參數和傳回的檔案名稱的順序並不保證; 使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>方法是否需要特定的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元規範

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"\*t 」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也不能包含任何無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查詢無效字元。

trans-unit.source: When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows:
trans-unit.target: 當您使用中的星號萬用字元`searchPattern`例如"\*.txt 」，在指定的擴充功能中的字元數，如下所示會影響搜尋：

trans-unit.source: If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的延伸模組是剛好三個字元，則方法會傳回具有延伸模組可開始具有指定之副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.xls"傳回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情況下，這個方法會傳回完全符合指定之副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.ai"會傳回"file.ai"，而不是"file.aif"。

trans-unit.source: When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用問號萬用字元時，則這個方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，指定兩個檔案、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother 」，在目錄中，搜尋模式的 「 檔案？。txt"會傳回只有第一個檔案，而搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。

trans-unit.source: Because this method checks against file names with both the 8.3 file name format and the long file name format, a search pattern similar to "\*1\*.txt" may return unexpected file names.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查檔案名稱與 8.3 檔案名稱格式及長檔名格式，因為的搜尋模式類似於 「\*1\*.txt 」 可能會傳回未預期的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, using a search pattern of "\*1\*.txt" returns "longfilename.txt" because the equivalent 8.3 file name format is "LONGFI~1.TXT".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用搜尋模式的 「\*1\*.txt"傳回"longfilename.txt"，因為對等的 8.3 檔案名稱格式是"LONGFI~1.TXT"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example counts the number of files that begin with the specified letter.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會計算指定的字母為開頭的檔案數目。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為檔案名稱。

A network error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生網路錯誤。

trans-unit.source: for access to path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 針對目前的目錄的存取權的路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of all files and subdirectories that meet specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合指定準則之所有檔案和子目錄的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之目錄的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串不會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of all files and subdirectories in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定路徑中所有檔案和子目錄的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of the names of files and subdirectories in the specified directory, or an empty array if no files or subdirectories are found.
trans-unit.target: 指定之目錄中的檔案及子目錄名稱陣列，如果找不到檔案或子目錄則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned file and directory names is not guaranteed; use the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> method if a specific sort order is required.
trans-unit.target: 不保證的順序傳回的檔案及目錄名稱。使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>方法是否需要特定的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合列舉項目的集合，當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>，您必須等候整個陣列的項目您可以存取陣列之前，先傳回。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A> with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>以星號 (\*) 指定為搜尋模式。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A> method to fill an array of strings with the names of all files and subdirectories in a user-specified location and prints each string in the array to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>每一個字串陣列中要在主控台的方法，以字串陣列中填入所有檔案和子目錄中的使用者指定的位置，並將列印的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會設定為通用的這個方法的攔截所有錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters with <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 來查詢無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a file name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: for access to path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 針對目前的目錄的存取權的路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之目錄的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串不會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of file and directories in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要比對 <c>path</c> 中檔案及目錄名稱的搜尋字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以包含有效常值路徑與萬用 (* 和 ?) 字元的組合，但是不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of file names and directory names that that match a search pattern in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之路徑中符合搜尋模式之檔案名稱及目錄名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of file names and directory names that match the specified search criteria, or an empty array if no files or directories are found.
trans-unit.target: 符合指定搜尋條件的檔案名稱及目錄名稱陣列，如果找不到檔案或目錄則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned file and directory names is not guaranteed; use the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> method if a specific sort order is required.
trans-unit.target: 不保證的順序傳回的檔案及目錄名稱。使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>方法是否需要特定的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元規範

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"\*t 」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也不能包含任何無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查詢無效字元。

trans-unit.source: When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows:
trans-unit.target: 當您使用中的星號萬用字元`searchPattern`例如"\*.txt 」，在指定的擴充功能中的字元數，如下所示會影響搜尋：

trans-unit.source: If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的延伸模組是剛好三個字元，則方法會傳回具有延伸模組可開始具有指定之副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.xls"傳回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情況下，這個方法會傳回完全符合指定之副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.ai"會傳回"file.ai"，而不是"file.aif"。

trans-unit.source: When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用問號萬用字元時，則這個方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，指定兩個檔案、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother 」，在目錄中，搜尋模式的 「 檔案？。txt"會傳回只有第一個檔案，而搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合列舉項目的集合，當您使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>，您必須等候整個陣列的項目您可以存取陣列之前，先傳回。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before getting the directory.
trans-unit.target: 尾端空白會從結尾`path`之前取得目錄的參數。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this method consists of all characters in the path up to, but not including, the last <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所傳回的字串所組成的路徑，但不是包括、 上次中的所有字元<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>。

trans-unit.source: For example, passing the path "C:\Directory\SubDirectory\test.txt" to <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetParent%2A> returns "C:\Directory\SubDirectory".
trans-unit.target: 例如，將路徑 「 C:\Directory\SubDirectory\test.txt 」 至<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetParent%2A>傳回"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"。

trans-unit.source: Passing "C:\Directory\SubDirectory" returns "C:\Directory".
trans-unit.target: 傳遞"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"傳回"C:\Directory"。

trans-unit.source: However, passing "C:\Directory\SubDirectory\\" returns "C:\Directory\SubDirectory", because the ending directory separator is after "SubDirectory".
trans-unit.target: 不過，傳遞"C:\Directory\SubDirectory\\"傳回"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"，因為結束的目錄分隔符號之後"子目錄"。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetParent%2A> method to retrieve the parent directory of a user-specified location, "path".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetParent%2A>方法來擷取上層目錄的使用者指定的位置，「 路徑 」。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetParent%2A> method is then printed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的值<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetParent%2A>方法接著會列印到主控台。

trans-unit.source: The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會設定為通用的這個方法的攔截所有錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目錄為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters with the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查詢無效字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <see cref="T:System.IO.PathTooLongException" /> topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.IO.PathTooLongException" /> 主題。

trans-unit.source: The specified path was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 格式無效。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework only: The caller does not have the required permissions.
trans-unit.target: 僅限 .NET Framework：呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: for reading from files or directories.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取檔案或目錄。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: The path of the file or directory to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移動的檔案或目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path to the new location for <c>sourceDirName</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>sourceDirName</c> 之新位置的路徑。

trans-unit.source: If <c>sourceDirName</c> is a file, then <c>destDirName</c> must also be a file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>sourceDirName</c> 是檔案，則 <c>destDirName</c> 也必須是檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Moves a file or a directory and its contents to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 移動檔案或目錄和其內容到新位置。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new directory with the name specified by `destDirName` and moves the contents of `sourceDirName` to the newly created destination directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用所指定的名稱建立新的目錄`destDirName`，並將內容移`sourceDirName`新建立的目的地目錄。

trans-unit.source: If you try to move a directory to a directory that already exists, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試將目錄移至的目錄已經存在，<xref:System.IO.IOException>就會發生。

trans-unit.source: For example, an exception will occur if you try to move c:\mydir to c:\public, and c:\public already exists.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您嘗試將 c:\mydir 移至 c:\public，而且 c:\public 已經存在，會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you could specify "c:\\\public\\\mydir" as the `destDirName` parameter, provided that "mydir" does not exist under "c:\\\public", or specify a new directory name such as "c:\\\newdir".
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以指定"c:\\\public\\\mydir"做為`destDirName`提供下不存在 」 mydir"參數"c:\\\public"，或指定新的目錄名稱，例如"c:\\\newdir"。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceDirName` and `destDirName` arguments are permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `sourceDirName`和`destDirName`引數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the path parameters before moving the directory.
trans-unit.target: 尾端空白會從 path 參數的結尾移除，才能移動目錄。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to move a directory and all its files to a new directory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何將目錄和其所有檔案移至新的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The original directory no longer exists after it has been moved.
trans-unit.target: 已移動後，原始的目錄不存在。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to move a directory to a different volume.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將目錄移至不同的磁碟區。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="destDirName" /> already exists.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destDirName" /> 已存在。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> and <paramref name="destDirName" /> parameters refer to the same file or directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> 和 <paramref name="destDirName" /> 參數參考到相同檔案或目錄。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The directory or a file within it is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 其他處理序正在使用此目錄或其中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> or <paramref name="destDirName" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> 或 <paramref name="destDirName" /> 是長度為零的字串，其中只包含泛空白字元，或包含一個或多個無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters with the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查詢無效字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> or <paramref name="destDirName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> 或 <paramref name="destDirName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The path specified by <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> 指定的路徑無效 (例如，位於未對應的磁碟上)。

trans-unit.source: for reading from <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> and writing to <paramref name="sourceDirName" /> and <paramref name="destDirName" />.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取<paramref name="sourceDirName" />和寫入<paramref name="sourceDirName" />和<paramref name="destDirName" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: A directory to add or remove access control list (ACL) entries from.
trans-unit.target: 要加入或從中移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目的目錄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> object that describes an ACL entry to apply to the directory described by the <c>path</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 物件，描述要套用至 <c>path</c> 參數所描述之目錄的 ACL 項目。

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> object to the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 物件所描述的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目套用至指定的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法適用於代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的檔案存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: The ACL specified for the `directorySecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ACL`directorySecurity`參數已取代的現有目錄 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL and modify it.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來取得現有的 ACL 並加以修改。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法仍然只存在<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件建立後已修改的物件。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>不修改物件，不會保存至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不可以擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同物件。

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another:
trans-unit.target: 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>從原始程式檔的物件。

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>目的地檔案的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>來源方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法可複製的資訊擷取到目的地的步驟 3 中<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件。

trans-unit.source: Set the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object to the destination file using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定目的地<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件到目的地檔案時使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 環境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>授與使用者時如果使用者具有<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>父資料夾的權限。

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>，拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>父目錄上。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> and the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> methods to add an access control list (ACL) entry and then remove an ACL entry from a directory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法，將存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目，然後從目錄移除 ACL 項目。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。

trans-unit.source: The date and time the directory or file was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立目錄或檔案的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: 這個值以本地時間表示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the creation date and time, in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) format, for the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定檔案或目錄的建立日期和時間，格式為國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

trans-unit.source: The specified path was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters with the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查詢無效字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.

trans-unit.source: for writing to the specified file or directory.

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The path to which the current working directory is set.
trans-unit.target: 設定為目前工作目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Sets the application's current working directory to the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 將應用程式的目前工作目錄設定為指定目錄。

trans-unit.source: When the application terminates, the working directory is restored to its original location (the directory where the process was started).
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式終止時，工作目錄還原至其原始位置 （其中已啟動處理程序的目錄）。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before setting the directory.
trans-unit.target: 尾端空白會從結尾`path`參數才能設定目錄。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: If you are setting the directory to a drive with removable media (for example, to "A:" for a floppy disk drive or "E:" for a CD-ROM drive), you can determine whether the drive is ready by using the <xref:System.IO.DriveInfo.IsReady%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要設定目錄，例如，若 （"a:"的軟碟機） 或"E"的 CD-ROM 光碟機要卸除式媒體的磁碟機，您可以判斷磁碟機是否準備好使用<xref:System.IO.DriveInfo.IsReady%2A>屬性。
